game.name: London Jigsaw Puzzle
game.description:
This time you enjoyed your vacation in the multiple locations of London! You again captured the pictures of 12 beautiful locations of the city from different angle. Like before, you look pretty excited to show them to your friends and family. But, you again met with a tragedy leaving all your pictures in the ripped form. Now you want to arrange them in any case. The good news is that you will be given plenty of opportunities to connect them in London Jigsaw Puzzle!

Your objective in this brand new arcade game is to arrange all the jigsaw pieces of most renowned landmarks in London. Drag and drag the picture at the place it deserves to be at! We are damn sure that you would have great fun while solving puzzles of popular locations like Trafalgar Square, Westminster Abbey, Hyde Park, Buckingham Palace, Tower of London, Big Ben, the London Eye and more. Use the hint shown at the top right corner of the screen to see how to go further in case if you are stuck in the game!

The best part is that you can modify the number of pipes in each row or column anytime you want during the gameplay. There are multiple backgrounds to play with and have fun alone or with your friends. Put your memory, logics, vision, concentration, and brain abilities to complete all of the challenges in this jigsaw puzzles London! You can track how much you have taken to complete the puzzle by having a look at the top middle of the screen. Good luck to complete all the puzzles!
